title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 189.8 - Invoice or bill of sale required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 189.8 - Invoice or bill of sale required

State Regulations

Any person selling, offering for sale or transporting for
sale lettuce within this State shall be required upon request, to produce an
invoice or bill of sale covering the sale of such lettuce. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
189.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
